AssessmentIssues.CategoryDescription: Migration Caveats highlights the current limitations with the migration workflow.
AssessmentIssues.Name: Foreign Table
AssessmentIssues.Description: Foreign table creation fails as SERVER and USER MAPPING objects are not exported by voyager. SERVER 'p10', and USER MAPPING should be created manually on the target to create and use the foreign table

AssessmentIssues.CategoryDescription: Migration Caveats highlights the current limitations with the migration workflow.
AssessmentIssues.Name: Foreign Table
AssessmentIssues.Description: Foreign table creation fails as SERVER and USER MAPPING objects are not exported by voyager. SERVER 'p10', and USER MAPPING should be created manually on the target to create and use the foreign table
AssessmentIssues.SqlStatement:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE public.f_t (
    i integer NOT NULL,
    ts timestamp(0) with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    j json,
    t text,
    e public.myenum,
    c public.mycomposit
)
SERVER p10
OPTIONS (
    table_name 't'
);

AssessmentIssues.CategoryDescription: Migration Caveats highlights the current limitations with the migration workflow.
AssessmentIssues.Name: Unsupported datatype for Live migration with fall-forward/fallback
AssessmentIssues.Description: There are some data types in the schema that are not supported by live migration with fall-forward/fall-back. These columns will be excluded when exporting and importing data in live migration workflows.

AssessmentIssues.CategoryDescription: Migration Caveats highlights the current limitations with the migration workflow.
AssessmentIssues.Name: Unsupported datatype for Live migration with fall-forward/fallback
AssessmentIssues.Description: There are some data types in the schema that are not supported by live migration with fall-forward/fall-back. These columns will be excluded when exporting and importing data in live migration workflows.

Objects.SqlStatement: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE public.f_c (     i integer NOT NULL,     t integer,     x text ) SERVER p10 OPTIONS (     table_name 'c' );

CREATE FOREIGN TABLE public.f_t (     i integer NOT NULL,     ts timestamp(0) with time zone DEFAULT now(),     j json,     t text,     e public.myenum,     c public.mycomposit ) SERVER p10 OPTIONS (     table_name 't' );

MigrationCaveats.FeatureDescription: During the export schema phase, SERVER and USER MAPPING objects are not exported. These should be manually created to make the foreign tables work.

MigrationCaveats.FeatureName: Unsupported Data Types for Live Migration with Fall-forward/Fallback
MigrationCaveats.FeatureDescription: There are some data types in the schema that are not supported by live migration with fall-forward/fall-back. These columns will be excluded when exporting and importing data in live migration workflows.
